description:
Added - It is now possible to perform simple Customer exports from the Customers page. 

 Added - Instead of keeping products Out Of Stock in Shopify when inventory reaches zero, it is now possible to set Waxconn to delete them. This option can be enabled in Shopify Channel settings.
Added - Autocomplete for comments and locations is now available on product creation.

added: Added Discogs 'allow offers' to products
Added new Updates notifier
changed: Minor layout changes in System channel settings

added: Added 'Advanced Settings' (price and available) on Discogs products detail page
Added option to 'lock' channel prices and exclude products from bulk repricing operations
Added notes to products about prices overwritten by bulk repricing operations
changed: Minor layout changes in System navigation

added: Added new Order Items detail page
fixed: Fixed Order Items detail page loading issue

changed: Minor improvements and layout changes in the product detail page and channel 'Advanced Settings'.
Discogs 'Allow Offer' checkbox was moved inside the channel 'Advanced Settings'.
fixed: Fixed some display issues related to selected channels and product details pages.

added: New 'Bulk Actions' for Products allows selecting and changing statuses of multiple products per request
New 'Publish by Default' option allows enabling/disabling the pre selection of sales channel on product creation
New 'Disable Sales' option allows disabling sales on Discogs (when you use Discogs only to search and create products)
changed: Major release updates and system stability improvements and fixes

added: New 'Charge Tax by Default' option allows enabling/disabling the pre selection of charge tax on product creation
New Product Search Filters allows sorting products by title, creation and update dates, and price
changed: Price is now displayed by default in the products listing
Minor improvements and listing changes for mobile view.

added: New Order Details Printing. Easily print your order details with the new 'Print' option.
fixed: Order list filters for channel and status were not setting their default values.

added: Minor UI improvements

fixed: POS channel not updating inventory and syncing to Discogs and Shopify.

added: New: Shopify Mapping Settings (title, description, tags, etc).
New: Bulk & Tools - Listings Manager (updates).
New: POS - Cancel in store orders.
changed: Improved: Some minor POS improvements (don't show out of stock items).
Improved: Lock Products while Syncing with Channels.
Improved: General API tweaks and stability.

fixed: Fixed: Typo in Shopify template property name (release_notes).

changed: Improved: Discogs search list results (format descriptions)

added: New: Product Bin Location
New: Shopify Metafield (single line text)
New: Format (Discogs) barcodes for scanning (in Shopify). Cleanup barcodes imported from Discogs before sending them to Shopify, to improve compatibility with barcode scanners.

fixed: Remove collections (under development) select box from create product form.

added: New API service status shows the current status of the connection with sales channels (discogs API).
changed: Minor improvement on Discogs Search to allow searching releases directly with Discogs release codes (e.g. [r27299607])

We are transitioning from the current instant search feature to a standard search. Now, you can press the Enter key or click the search button to execute your search. This change is aimed at improving performance and reducing unnecessary searches.

fixed: Discogs search returns server error from out of range requests and cached page item from a previous search.
